objects.text: • NON-TOXIC • SAFE FOR KIDS • HOURS OF FUN

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This vibrant and playful banner design uses a colorful, radial gradient purple background with a soft, glowing white circular element at the center, drawing the eye to the product image. The main product is centered within the circular highlight, making it the visual focal point. Above the product, a large, vibrant heading (id: "heading") catches attention with its bold neon green font. Beneath it, a subheading (id: "subheading") provides a tagline in clean white text. A bright green circular price badge (id: "price") overlaps the central circle, emphasizing affordability. At the base, a descriptive benefits list (id: "description") enhances credibility, while a green rectangular call-to-action button (id: "cta_button") with corresponding text (id: "cta") invites engagement. Floating bubbles and decorative wave lines in various opacities and pastel blues-purple give a fun, bubbly atmosphere throughout the banner.

**Color Palette**:  
- Background Purple: #6A1B9A  
- Gradient Highlight: #E0F7FA to #FFFFFF  
- Neon Green (Price & Headline): #76FF03, #64DD17  
- White Text & Accents: #FFFFFF  
- Accent Purple for text: #6A1B9A  
- Bubble shades: #E1F5FE, #B3E5FC, #81D4FA
product_color: The product image features a vibrant, playful color palette ideal for a kids-centric advertisement banner. The dominant color is neon green (#7FFFBF), present in the liquid and bottle, creating a fresh, energetic vibe. The label incorporates a fun mix of purple (#8E44AD) as the background, contrasted with bright yellow (#FFD700) in the word "BUBBLES" and bright green (#A6E22E) in "Gazillion". The outlines use orange (#FFA500) and dark blue (#2C3E50) for bold definition. Soft hues like sky blue (#AED6F1) and bubble highlights of white and pink (#FADADD) blend seamlessly to enhance the product's bubbly, whimsical appeal.
